## Data Visualization

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

# Load required libraries
library(ggplot2)

# Create sample data
sample_data <- data.frame(
  x = 1:10,
  y = rnorm(10)
)

# Create plot
ggplot(sample_data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Sample Visualization",
       x = "X Axis",
       y = "Y Axis")
```
